sentences.sentence: Some nostrum peddled as a cure for unemployment.
sentences.translation: 鼓吹可解决失业问题的妙策。

sentences.sentence: For the Mare Nostrum the adventure stopped after these 398 watches.
sentences.translation: 为马我们的冒险停下后，这398手表。

sentences.sentence: There is no nostrum in the world. To keep FIT, just come to this body-building centre and have a try.
sentences.translation: 世上本无万能灵药，欲健康，请来本健美中心试一试。
